name: Petro Salema
bio:
Petro currently leads the development of [Aloha Editor](http://www.alohaeditor.org), to make the web a platform for text based editing.

He discovered the possibilities for software to impact the human condition with the World Wide Web in his early teens. He noticed that most of the limitations on what we can build with software are only as insurmountable as the limits to our imagination, and thus began his study of code and designâ€”the craft, and the people behind it.
